CHANGES
=======

1.1.3 (2017-02-26)
------------------

- Support AArch64

1.1.2 (2017-01-08)
------------------

- Support Python 3.6

1.1.1 (2016-11-05)
------------------

- Use len() function (9e61cb9e96b138b0d18e5f9e013e144202ae4067)

- Remove detect function in _cchardet.pyx (25b581294fc0ae8f686ac9972c8549666766f695)

- Support manylinux1 wheel

1.1.0 (2016-10-17)
------------------

- Add Detector class

- Improve unit tests
